I would create a dental hygiene routine that includes regular flossing, brushing, and mouthwash to maintain good oral health.
I would consult with a dentist to identify any potential issues and take preventative measures to avoid tooth decay or other dental problems.
I would research and experiment with natural remedies and home treatments for common dental issues, such as using baking soda and vinegar for teeth whitening.
I would prioritize a balanced diet that includes plenty of fruits and vegetables, which are rich in vitamins and minerals that promote healthy teeth and gums.
I would seek out alternative dental professionals, such as dental hygienists or holistic dentists, who may offer different approaches to dental care.
